workshops.title: Introduction to Programming in Python
workshops.desc: Introduction to Programming in Python encompasses a comprehensive exploration of the core principles of programming, with a focus on text-based coding using Python. You will delve into programming concepts such as data types, control flow, and functions. Additionally, you will acquire problem-solving skills and develop critical thinking abilities like a programmer, including following the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and working collaboratively in teams.
workshops.for: This curriculum is specifically designed for high school and later middle school students, and it does not require any previous programming experience.

workshops.title: Introduction to Programming in Java
workshops.desc: Introduction to Programming in Java encompasses a comprehensive exploration of the core principles of programming, with a focus on text-based coding using Java. You will learn core programming principles including data types, control flow, methods, and object-oriented programming skills. Through problem-solving exercises and collaborative teamwork, you will develop critical thinking abilities and follow the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). This ciriculum is designed to help better prepare students for the AP Computer Science A.
workshops.for: This curriculum is specifically designed for high school and later middle school students, and it does not require any previous programming experience, however some critical thinking skills are important

workshops.title: Intro to Web Development
workshops.desc: Learn everything you need to know to build web based application. You'll explore topics such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, the three foundational technologies of the web, and discover how to use them to design and structure web apps, add multimedia content, and make your site responsive to different devices. Additionally, you will acquire problem-solving skills and develop critical thinking abilities like a programmer, including following the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and working collaboratively in teams.
workshops.for: This curriculum is specifically designed for high school and later middle school students, and it does not require any previous programming experience.
